import Path from "../../paths"; import {NavLink, useParams} from "react-router-dom"; export default function Header() { const setActive = ({ isActive }) => isActive ? "header-nav-list-item-link active" : "header-nav-list-item-link"; const params = useParams(); console.log(params) return (
  • Home Page
  • All ads
  • Create Ad
  • Search
  • Logout
  • Register
  • Login
); }
